Package CAMSv2

Class StaffDataBase

java.lang.Object
CAMSv2.DataBase
CAMSv2.StaffDataBase
public class StaffDataBase extends DataBase
The StaffDataBase Class Manages the data related to staff members, including loading from and writing to a CSV file.
